cfallin commented on Issue #2843:

Looks like the filetest added in the earlier change to the store side needs to be updated (just changing movslq -> movq should be enough I think).

Looks like the filetest added in the earlier change to the store side needs to be updated (just changing movslq -> movq should be enough I think).
